SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.percussion.cms.objectstore.server
Class PSItemDefManager

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.server.PSItemDefManager

public class PSItemDefManager
extends Object

This class maintains a registry of all active content types. A content type is a collection of the various design elements that compose a content item. The goal is to collect all of the pieces that are distributed in various places including the file system and multiple tables in the repository. These elements include:

  • Content editor definition (stored in an Rx application)
  • Content type definition (stored in the CONTENTTYPES table)
  • Slots assigned to this content type, (which include variants assigned to that slot)

This registry provides acccess only to content types that have a running application, and thus can be used to create and access content.

This class provides access to 2 types of objects, what is known as a summary and the complete definition for a content type. The summary provides a name and description and is typically useful for generating UIs.

Each list can be filtered based on the community. When trying to get a definition, the type they are trying to get must be visible to the community to which the requestor is logged in or they will not see those.

public static final int COMMUNITY_ANY
Constant indicating all or any community. This can be used to specify not to filter content type defiitions by community.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static PSItemDefManager getInstance()
This class implements the singleton pattern. The single instance of this class is available using this method. A long lived object should call this method and save the returned reference for the duration of the program to prevent garbage collection of it.

The instance is created the first time this method is called.

Returns:
The only instance of this class, never null.

getFieldsByName

public Collection getFieldsByName(long[] ctypeIds,
                                  String fieldName)
Searches every registered content type identified by ctypeIds for a field whose name matches fieldName. This is done by calling PSItemDefinition.getFieldByName(fieldName) on each registered content editor.

Parameters:
ctypeIds - An array of 0 or more content type identifiers within which to search. If null or empty, all registered types are searched. If a supplied id is not registered, it is skipped. No community filtering is done.
fieldName - The name of fields to retrieve. A case-insensitive compare is performed. Never null or empty.
Returns:
A collection of PSField objects, each of which has a name equal to fieldName (case insensitive). Never null, may be empty if no matches are found.

getFieldLabel

public String getFieldLabel(long ctypeId,
                            String fieldName)
Returns the display label for a the specified field name of a particualr content type.

Parameters:
ctypeId - must be a valid content type id.
fieldName - the field name whose label needs to be returned. Cannot be null or empty.
Returns:
the field's display label or null.

getContentTypeIds

public long[] getContentTypeIds(PSSecurityToken securityToken)
Gets the ids of all running content editors visible to the requestor.

Parameters:
securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how access is controlled. Never null.
Returns:
An array of 0 or more numeric identifiers, one for each running content editor visible to the requestor. These can be used to obtain definitions or summaries of the associated content type.

getContentTypeIds

public long[] getContentTypeIds(int communityId)
Gets the ids of all running content editors which are visible to the supplied community via community id.

Parameters:
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. COMMUNITY_ANY to not to filter by community.
Returns:
An array of 0 or more numeric identifiers, one for each running content editor visible to the community supplied. If no content types are found for the community with especified communityid , an empty array is returned.

getAllContentTypeIds

public long[] getAllContentTypeIds(int communityId)
Gets the ids of all running content editors (both visible and not visible) to the supplied community via community id.

Parameters:
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. COMMUNITY_ANY to not to filter by community.
Returns:
An array of 0 or more numeric identifiers, one for each running content editor visible to the community supplied. If no content types are found for the community with especified communityid , an empty array is returned.

getContentTypeNames

public String[] getContentTypeNames(PSSecurityToken securityToken)
Same as getContentTypeIds(PSSecurityToken), except it returns the names rather than the numeric id. Content type names are unique across the system (case insensitive).

Parameters:
securityToken - See getContentTypeIds(PSSecurityToken).
Returns:
An array of 0 or more non-empty String identifiers, one for each running content editor visible to the requestor. These can be used to obtain definitions of the associated content type.

getContentTypeNames

public String[] getContentTypeNames(int communityId)
Same as getContentTypeIds(int), except it returns the names rather than the numeric id. Content type names are unique across the system (case insensitive).

Parameters:
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. COMMUNITY_ANY to not to filter by community.
Returns:
An array of 0 or more non-empty String identifiers, one for each running content editor visible to the supplied community. These can be used to obtain definitions of the associated content type.

contentTypeIdToName

public String contentTypeIdToName(long contentTypeId)
                           throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Content types can be uniquely identified by their name or numeric id. Maps the supplied identifier to the name of the content type associated with that id. No visibility restrictions are applied.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content type handlers.
Returns:
If the supplied id is valid, a non-empty name is returned. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied id is not valid.

contentTypeIdToLabel

public String contentTypeIdToLabel(long contentTypeId)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Maps the supplied identifier with a display label for the given content type.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content type handlers.
Returns:
If the supplied id is valid, a non-empty name is returned. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied id is not valid.

contentTypeNameToId

public long contentTypeNameToId(String contentTypeName)
                         throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Just like contentTypeIdToName(long), except the name rather than the id is supplied.

Parameters:
contentTypeName - A non-empty identifier for a content type. A valid name matches of of the names of the running content type handlers. The comparison is performed case insensitive.
Returns:
If the supplied name is valid, the identifier of the type using the supplied name, otherwise an exception is thrown.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied name does not match any running content type.

getSummary

public PSItemDefSummary getSummary(long contentTypeId,
                                   PSSecurityToken securityToken)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
A summary provides a couple of pieces of information about an item definition. They are typically used to provide a list and description to a user when creating a user interface. Normally, the getSummaries method is used to get all available summaries.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired content type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content editors visible to the requestor.
securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how access is controlled. Never null.
Returns:
If a valid id is supplied, the summary for the corresponding content type is returned, otherwise an exception is thrown.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied id is not valid.
See Also:
getSummaries(PSSecurityToken)

getSummary

public PSItemDefSummary getSummary(long contentTypeId,
                                   int communityId)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Same as getSummary(long,PSSecurityToken), except it restricts the content type by the supplied community id instead of that from PSSecurityToken.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired content type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content editors visible to the requestor.
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. COMMUNITY_ANY to not to filter by community.
Returns:
This method returns summary for the content type. Will be null if the content type requested is not visible to the community supplied.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied id is not valid. For a content type id to be valid, the content editor for that type must be running on ther server.

public PSItemDefSummary getSummary(String contentTypeName,
                                   PSSecurityToken securityToken)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Same as getSummary(long,PSSecurityToken), except based on the name.

Parameters:
contentTypeName - The name of the desired content type. A valid name matches one of the names of the running editors. The comparison is done case insensitive.
securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how access is controlled. Never null.
Returns:
If a valid name is supplied, the summary for the corresponding content type is returned, otherwise, null is returned.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied name is not valid.

                                   int communityId)

getSummaries

public Collection getSummaries(PSSecurityToken securityToken)
Get a collection of summaries for all content types visible to the requestor's community. See getSummary for details.

Parameters:
securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how filtering is controlled. Never null.
Returns:
A summary for every content type visible to the requestor. Each element in the returned collection is a PSItemDefSummary. The requestor takes ownership of the returned collection - changes to it do not affect this class.

getSummaries

public Collection getSummaries(int communityId)
Same as getSummaries(PSSecurityToken) except that the content types are filtered by supplied community id instead of requestor's commuity.

Parameters:
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. -1 to not to restrict by community.
Returns:
A summary for every content type visible to the supplied community. Each element in the returned collection is a PSItemDefSummary. The requestor takes ownership of the returned collection - changes to it do not affect this class.

getItemDef

public PSItemDefinition getItemDef(long contentTypeId,
                                   PSSecurityToken securityToken)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Get the item defintion for the specified content type id. An item definition is the object representation of a content type. A content type is a collection of design data that defines how to create and modify a particular type of content item.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired content type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content editors visible to the request.
securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how access is controlled. Never null.
Returns:
A valid def if an editor matching the supplied type id is running and the requestor has the required access rights. If requestor cannot see the content type, a runtime exception is thrown. Never null. The returned item should be treated as read-only as it is the original object.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied id is not valid.

getItemDef

public PSItemDefinition getItemDef(long contentTypeId,
                                   int communityId)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Same as getItemDef(long, PSSecurityToken) but filtered by the supplied community instead of requestor's community.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The id of the desired content type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content editors visible to the request.
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. -1 to not to restrict by community.
Returns:
A valid def if an editor matching the supplied type id is running and the def is visible to the supplied community. May be null. The returned item should be treated as read-only as it is the original object.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied content type id is not valid.

securityToken - A security identifier that contains the requestor's security info. See the class description for details on how access is controlled. Never null.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the supplied name is not valid.

                                   int communityId)
                            throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException

Parameters:
itemId - the item locator. May not be null.
communityId - community id to filter the content types by. -1 to not to restrict by community.

getItemContentType

public long getItemContentType(PSLocator itemId)
Makes an internal request to determine the content type id of the specified content item.

Parameters:
itemId - the item locator. May not be null.
Returns:
the content type id, -1 if no matching content type is found.

getCmsObject

public PSCmsObject getCmsObject(long contentTypeId)
Retrieves the cached cms object from a content type id.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - The content type id of the type of interest. If the content type does not exist, null is returned.
Returns:
If there isn't a cached instance, null is returned.

registerDef

public long registerDef(String appName,
                        PSContentEditor editorDef)
                 throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
During a content editor handler's initialization, it must call this method to register its definition. During its shutdown sequence, it must call unRegisterDef. If the same def is registered more than once, the successive registrations replace the earlier ones.

Parameters:
editorDef - The complete definition for the content editor, never null.
appName - The name of the application that contains the supplied def. Never null or empty.
Returns:
The content type id of the def that was registered.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If a matching definition in the repository cannot be found. In this case, the handler should not start.
RuntimeException - If a listener throws an exception. The handler should not start in this case either.

registerDef

public void registerDef(PSItemDefinition def,
                        PSCmsObject cmsObject)
Registers an item definition for the supplied paremeters.

Parameters:
def - the item definition to register, not null, must contain a valid description and content editor object.
cmsObject - the cms object to register, not null.

getTypeEditorUrl

public String getTypeEditorUrl(long contentTypeId)
                        throws PSException
Gets the content editor url based on a content type passed as an id.

Parameters:
contentTypeId - a number representing the content type
Returns:
the url where the content type editor is located as String, never null or empty.
Throws:
PSException - if the content type does not exist.

                              int variantId)
                       throws PSInternalRequestCallException

Throws:
PSInternalRequestCallException

getAssemblerUrl

public String getAssemblerUrl(IPSRequestContext request,
                              int variantId)
                       throws PSInternalRequestCallException
Get the assembler url for the supplied variant id.

Parameters:
request - the request to do the url lookup, not null.
variantId - the variant id for which to lookup the assembler url.
Returns:
the assembler url in a form like ../casArticle/casArticle.html, may be null if no variant was found ffor the supplied id.
Throws:
PSInternalRequestCallException - for any errors making the lookup.

isVisibleToCommunity

public boolean isVisibleToCommunity(long contentTypeId,
                                    int communityId)
                             throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
This method performs the following checks in order.
  1. Makes sure the supplied content type (via content type id) is part of the available content types.
  2. Checks to see if the object type is content item. Returns true if it is not an item assuming the other object types need no filtering by community.
    3. Check succeeds if the supplied community is COMMUNITY_ANY, which means no filtering is required Finally it makes sure the community id supplied is configurd to be visible to the supplied community by making an internal request to a Rhythmyx resource

    Parameters:
    contentTypeId - The id of the desired content type. A valid id matches one of the ids of the running content editors.
    communityId - community id to filter the content types by. -1 to not to filter by community.
    Returns:
    true if the content type asked is available and visible to the supplied community based on the checks described in the method description.
    Throws:
    com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - If the content type id supplied is not listed in the avaialble content types.

unRegisterDef

public void unRegisterDef(PSContentEditor editorDef)
                   throws Exception
This method is used to remove a content type definition from the registry. It should be called whenever the handler for this content type shuts down.

Parameters:
editorDef - Must be the same def that was passed in to the registerDef method. Never null.
Throws:
Exception - if the called listener throws an exception.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to add, must never be null

public void removeListener(com.percussion.cms.objectstore.server.IPSItemDefChangeListener listener)

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove, must never be null

clearListeners

public void clearListeners()
Unregister all listeners currently listenering for changes to item def registration.

deferUpdateNotifications

public void deferUpdateNotifications()
Set the deferring notifications flag. If this flag is set, then calls that ordinarily will make the search system restart will be deferred.

commitUpdateNotifications

public void commitUpdateNotifications()
Causes any deferred work to be passed to the item def listeners. Right now this is only item registrations.

getContentTypeIcon

public Map<String,String> getContentTypeIcon(int ctypeId)
                                      throws com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException
Gets the content type icon mode and value for the given content type id.

Parameters:
ctypeId, - id of the contenttype, throws PSInvalidContentTypeException, if it is not a valid contenttype id.
Returns:
a map of icon source and value. See PSContentEditor.getIconSource() for details of source and See PSContentEditor.getIconValue() for the details of value.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSInvalidContentTypeException - See getItemDef(long, int).

getContentTypeIconPaths

public Map<PSLocator,String> getContentTypeIconPaths(List<PSLocator> itemLoc)
Gets the contenttype icon paths for the supplied list of locators. The path may be empty or null if the content type of the item is not specified with an icon or failed to determine the icon. If the item's contenttype iconSource is PSContentEditor.ICON_SOURCE_NONE then the path for that item is set to null. If it is PSContentEditor.ICON_SOURCE_SPECIFIED then the iconValue is prefixed with "../rx_resources/images/ContentTypeIcons/" and set as item's icon path. If it is PSContentEditor.ICON_SOURCE_FROMFILEEXT then the icon path is determined by FileIcons.properties.

Parameters:
itemLoc - List of item locators must not be null.
Returns:
Map of locators and icon paths. Never null may be empty.
